metadata.synopsis: Danis is standing not far away from the campfire, enjoying the festivities.
metadata.how_to_trigger: in recon: oe qnight NIGHT_GoblinHunt_TieflingCelebration_1ad8c357-2695-4d5c-b5f9-8b8c07803121Go to camp and skip triggered dialogues.goto -635; -181Talk to Danis.

0.speaker: Danis
0.text: I planned on sitting it out tonight. Then I imagined what Bex would say, and...
0.context: NodeContext: A little timid and bittersweet. They're finally saved after month's of stress, but his lover didn't live to see it.

3.speaker: Danis
3.context: NodeContext: wry - he's only here and drinking because his late wife would want him to be.

5.speaker: Danis
5.context: NodeContext: Catching himself, thoughtful - but still drunk

2.speaker: Danis
2.text: Thanks for letting us do this. I feel... maybe not good. But better.
2.context: NodeContext: Defeated - he's had his drunken outburst and just all grief now.

4.speaker: Danis
4.text: Do devils even grow turnips? Can't all be souls and 'flesh of the damned'.
4.context: NodeContext: First line is drunkly pondering, second line dismissive - back to drinking.
